name: OR_LNLG_PSTOP_APPT
description: This table contains the Postop Appointments information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_UID
columns.description: The unique ID of the post-op appointment.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_VT_ID_PRC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the visit type.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_PRC_ID
columns.description: The procedure ID of the post-op appointment.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_PRC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_PRV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: POSTOP_APPT_DEP_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.
